no_hardcoded_paths.pattern: Use browser-detector.js for all browser paths
violations_fixed: Removed hardcoded Edge path from vrt.js
no_hardcoded_paths.enforcement: All browser paths must use getBrowserPath()

memory_management.pattern: Always use finally blocks for browser.close()
memory_management.enforcement: No browser launch without corresponding close

error_handling.user_feedback: Clear error messages with chalk colors

console_usage.allowed: User feedback and progress indicators only
console_usage.implementation: Use ora spinners and chalk for output

file_organization.pattern: Single CLI entry point with modular lib components

testing_standards.quick_test: npm run test:quick for basic functionality
testing_standards.local_test: npm run test:hattch for full capture test
